title: 13: S4E13 – "Scares Everywhere" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three terrifying tales from authors Bryce Simmons, Max Minton, and Daniel Martins, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about invading extraterrestrials, evil encounters, and aquatic anomalies. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e13
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
